triples.name: Policy Iteration
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel policy iteration-type algorithm for solving optimal control of PBCNs.

triples.name: Optimal Control
triples.relevance: Optimal control is the main problem being solved in this paper with infinite horizon average cost criterion.

triples.name: Boolean Network
triples.relevance: Probabilistic Boolean networks (PBCNs) are the dynamical systems that the paper addresses for control.

triples.name: Jordan Normal Form
triples.relevance: Jordan decomposition method is used to derive the novel policy iteration algorithm.

triples.name: Laurent Series
triples.relevance: Laurent series expression technique is used to derive the policy iteration algorithm for PBCNs.

triples.name: Full State Feedback
triples.relevance: The paper presents optimal state feedback law as the solution form for the control problem.

triples.name: L-Arabinose Operon
triples.relevance: The ara operon in E. coli is used as a biological application to demonstrate the proposed theoretical approach.
